pullRequest.title: [#1297] - teku validator register subcommand - use private key from encrypted keystore
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description

Introduce additional cli options in teku validator register subcommand to allow using BLS keystore for signer private key.

     --signing-keystore-file=<FILE>
                            Path to the keystore file containing encrypted
                              signing key for the validator
      --signing-keystore-password-env=<ENV_VAR>
                            Read password from environment variable to decrypt
                              the validator keystore
      --signing-keystore-password-file=<FILE>
                            Read password from the file to decrypt the
                              validator keystore

These cli options are mutually exclusive with --signing-key
